# appendItems(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the specified items to the section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
func appendItems(_ items: [Any])
```

## Creating a section snapshot

- **init()**: Creates an empty section snapshot.
- **ofParentItem(_:)**: Creates a section snapshot containing the child items of the specified parent item, excluding the parent item.
- **ofParentItem(_:includingParentItem:)**: Creates a section snapshot containing the child items of the specified parent item, including the parent item.
- **appendItems(_:intoParentItem:)**: Adds the specified items as child items of the specified parent item in the section snapshot.

items.description: Creates a section snapshot containing the child items of the specified parent item, excluding the parent item.
items.name: ofParentItem(_:)

items.description: Creates a section snapshot containing the child items of the specified parent item, including the parent item.
items.name: ofParentItem(_:includingParentItem:)

items.description: Adds the specified items as child items of the specified parent item in the section snapshot.
items.name: appendItems(_:intoParentItem:)
